header_text: In the corridor at work, your boss asks you a question, and you realize you respond incorrectly. Your boss corrects you. You think the experience of being corrected by your boss is awful.

elements.Text: Is it okay to occasionally answer a question from your boss incorrectly?

elements.name: In the corridor at work, your boss asks you a question, and you realize you respond incorrectly. Your boss corrects you. You think the experience of being corrected by your boss is awful._Work/Career Development_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
